column5: Accidentally broke a BPS ExtremeÂ® XPS rod about 3" from tip, my last time out. Took it with my receipt to customer service at the Vaughn store and they replaced it, not a question asked. Got the rod in April with a Pflueger President reel, and christened them with Beaver R Rainbows. Have used quite a bit this summer and enjoyed it very much.
Great to hear good news, DonF, especially from a big box store.  Let it be told that they are a great supporter of small local causes too.
